title: Find Ketheric Thorm's Relic
content:
scriptions

After capturing the Nightsong alongside Balthazar, we reported our success to Ketheric Thorm. Disciple Z'rell was pleased we assisted Balthazar and brought Nightsong to Moonrise. We killed Nightsong, making Ketheric Thorm vulnerable. We killed Nightsong, making Ketheric Thorm vulnerable.

How to Unlock Find Ketheric Thorm's Relic

Location: Gauntlet of Shar Find Ketheric Thorm's Relic is a subquest for the primary Main Quest: Infiltrate Moonrise Towers
